title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-2.2 - Licensing examinations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 79-2.2 - Licensing examinations

State Regulations

An applicant may fulfill the examination requirement by
submitting evidence of having successfully completed the examination of the

National Commission for the Certification of Acupuncturists, or any other
examination which the department determines to be the equivalent in terms of
content, scoring, administration, security and other comparable factors which
affect the validity or integrity of the examination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
79-2.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
